authScene.claimText: Stump服务器尚未被初始化。请使用以下表单创建您的帐户。创建后，您将能够完全访问所有服务器功能。

libraryConfiguration.heading: 图书馆设置
libraryConfiguration.subtitleCreating: 您的新图书馆的预览将在下面显示
libraryConfiguration.subtitleEditing: 您的图书库编辑的预览将在下方显示

createBookClubScene.heading: 创建一个新的读书俱乐部
createBookClubScene.subtitle: 您可以创建一个私人书俱乐部，或者创建一个公开的服务可以让任何人都可以加入

description.label: 描述
description.placeholder: An 'Our Flag Means Death' fan club. We read pirate fiction to our hearts content
description.description: 您的读书俱乐部的简短描述(可选)

is_private.label: 私人俱乐部
is_private.description: 如果启用，只有您邀请的用户才能够加入您的读书俱乐部

member_role_spec.heading: 自定义角色映射
subtitle: 您可以为您的读书俱乐部中的角色创建自定义名称。 例如，您可以将“成员”角色重命名为“Crewmate”，或将“Creator”重命名为“Captain”。 如果您不想使用自定义名称，您可以将这些字段留空，将使用默认名称。 关于角色的更多信息，请参阅：
文档

member.label: 会员
member.description: 您的读书俱乐部默认角色的名称

moderator.label: 版主
moderator.description: 您的读书俱乐部的版主名称

admin.label: 管理员
admin.description: 您的读书俱乐部的管理员角色名称

creator.label: 创建者
creator.description: 您的读书俱乐部创建者角色的名称。这是您！

creator_preferences.heading: 您的会员选项
creator_preferences.subtitle: 对于您在读书俱乐部中的会员资格的一些偏好。这些偏好可以随时从读书俱乐部设置页面更改

creator_display_name.label: Display Name
creator_display_name.description: An optional display name for your membership in the book club. If set, this takes precedence over your username

creator_hide_progress.label: Hide Progress
creator_hide_progress.description: If enabled, your read progress will be hidden from other members of the book club

createLibraryScene.heading: Create New Library
createLibraryScene.subtitle: Libraries are used to group your books together. If you're wanting a refresh on libraries and how they work, check out the

labels.libraryPathDescription: The path to the library as it exists on your server

manageLibraryScene.heading: Manage Library
manageLibraryScene.subtitle: Update the details or configuration of your library, change control access rules, or scan files. If you're wanting a refresh on libraries and how they work, check out the

labels.libraryPathDescription: The path to the library as it exists on your server

emptyState.heading: 没有书可以显示
emptyState.message: 您正在阅读的任何书都会显示在这里

emptyState.heading: 没有要显示的系列
emptyState.message: 您添加到书库中的任何系列都会在此处显示

emptyState.heading: 没有书可以显示
emptyState.message: 您添加到书库中的任何系列都会在此处显示

general.heading: 通用设置
general.subtitle: 使用下面的表单来管理您的偏好设置和账户设置。

validation.invalidUrl: 请输入有效的 URL 地址

errors.updateFailed: 更新您的个人资料时发生服务器错误。请重试。

avatarPicker.heading: 设置您的头像
avatarPicker.subtitle: Stump 支持自定义头像，这些头像可以通过提供图片的 URL 来设置。 为减少服务器上存储的数据数量，不支持图像上传。
avatarPicker.preview: 当您输入了一个URL，预览将会显示在这里。

theme.heading: 应用主题
theme.subtitle: Stump支持亮色主题和黑色主题，这些主题可以设置在下面。

light.label: 浅色主题
light.description: 不推荐使用Stump的亮色主题。

locale.heading: 语言和本地化设置
subtitle: Stump 支持多种语言和本地化语言，请在下方设置您的偏好。请考虑帮助提高语言质量。
Stump 翻译
如果你能做到！

jobs.heading: 任务和配置
jobs.subtitle: 查看和管理此服务器上可用的后台任务，包括库扫描和计划
jobs.schedulingSubtitle: Manage the scheduling of background jobs on this server. Changes to this configuration will take effect after a server restart
jobs.historySubtitle: Manage running jobs and view the history of completed jobs

historyTable.emptyHeading: There are no jobs to display
historyTable.emptySubtitle: You can't have a job if you don't have a job
historyTable.deleteAllMessage: Job history and statistics may be deleted from the database at any time. This action cannot be undone

server.heading: Server Settings
server.subtitle: Manage various configurable options for your Stump server instance, itself

discordPresence.label: Discord Presence
discordPresence.description: Display your Stump activity in Discord using Discord Rich Presence

users.heading: User Management
users.subtitle: Manage the users on this server, including creating new users and changing their permissions

createOrUpdateUsers.createSubtitle: Use the form below to create a new user on this server
createOrUpdateUsers.updateSubtitle: Use the form below to update the details of this user

accessControl.heading: Access control and restrictions
subtitle: If you want to restrict access to certain content based on tags or age rating, you can do so here. Any unset values means that the restriction will not be enforced. For more information about access control, see the
documentation

ageRestriction.label: Age restriction
ageRestriction.description: Restricts the user from accessing content above the set age rating threshold

enforceUnset.label: Enforce on unset
enforceUnset.description: If enabled, users will be restricted from accessing content with no age rating available

tagRestriction.label: Tag restrictions
tagRestriction.description: Restricts the user from accessing content with the selected tags

permissions.heading: Granted permissions
subtitle: Select the permissions you want to grant to this user. For more information on what each permission does, see the
documentation

read.label: Access book club features
read.description: Allows the user to access book club features, including viewing and joining book clubs

create.label: Create book clubs
create.description: Allows the user to create new book clubs

explorer.label: File Explorer
explorer.description:
Allows the user to access the Library File Explorer.
Content restriction is not supported when this feature is granted

upload.label: Upload files
upload.description: Allows the user to upload files to the server

create.label: Create libraries
create.description:
Allows the user to create new libraries.
Includes permissions to edit and scan

scan.label: Scan libraries
scan.description: Allows the user to initiate scans for existing libraries

edit.label: Edit libraries
edit.description: Allows the user to edit basic details for existing libraries

manage.label: Manage libraries
manage.description:
Allows the user to manage advanced settings for existing libraries.
Includes permissions to edit and scan

delete.label: Delete libraries
delete.description:
Allows the user to delete existing libraries.
Includes permissions to edit, manage, and scan

validation.ageRestrictionTooLow: Age restriction cannot be less than 0

desktop.message:
A network error occurred that suggests your Stump server is currently unavailable. Please ensure that it is running and accessible from this device.
If your server URL has changed, you can update it using the form below

web.message: A network error occurred that suggests your Stump server is currently unavailable. Please ensure that it is running and accessible from this device
